content: धरुण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [धृ-उनन्] <ab>Ved.</ab> Holding, bearing, carrying, supporting. --णः {@--1@} An epithet of Brahman. {@--2@} Heaven, paradise. {@--3@} Water, ({%<ab>n.</ab>%} also). {@--4@} Opinion. {@--5@} A place where anything is preserved. {@--6@} Fire. {@--7@} A sucking calf. --णं {@--1@} Basis, prop, support. {@--2@} Firm soil. {@--3@} A reservoir.
